service.name: /pord402.po
service.query: SELECT PBNB.STR_CD /* 점코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_STORE_NAME(PBNB.STR_CD) AS STR_NM /* 점명 */ , SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,1,4) AS SALE_ORG_BM /* 부문 조직코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME( SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,1,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,3,2), '00', '00', '00' ) AS SALE_ORG_BM_NM /* 부문 조직명 */ , SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,1,6) AS SALE_ORG_TEAM /* 팀 조직코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME( SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,1,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,3,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,5,2), '00', '00' ) AS SALE_ORG_TEAM_NM /* 팀 조직명 */ , SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,1,8) AS SALE_ORG_PC /* PC 조직코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME( SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,1,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,3,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,5,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,7,2), '00' ) AS SALE_ORG_PC_NM /* PC 조직명 */ , SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD /* 조직코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME( SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,1,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,3,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,5,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,7,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD,9,2) ) AS SALE_ORG_NM /* 조직명 */ , PBNB.PUMBUN_CD /* 품번코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_PUMBUN_NAME(PBNB.PUMBUN_CD) AS PUMBUN_NM /* 품번명 */ , PBNB.EVENT_CD /* 행사코드 */ , PBNB.MG_RATE AS MG_RATE /* 마진율 */ , PBNB.VEN_CD /* 협력사코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_VENDOR_NAME(PBNB.VEN_CD) AS VEN_NM /* 협력사명 */ , PBNB.BUY_QTY - PBNB.RFD_QTY - PBNB.LEND_QTY + PBNB.BORROW_QTY + PBNB.STRI_QTY - PBNB.STRO_QTY AS CHK_QTY /* 확정수량 */ , PBNB.BUY_COST_AMT - PBNB.RFD_COST_AMT - PBNB.LEND_COST_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_COST_AMT + PBNB.STRI_COST_AMT - PBNB.STRO_COST_AMT AS CHK_COST_TAMT /* 확정원가금액 */ , PBNB.BUY_VAT_AMT - PBNB.RFD_VAT_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_VAT_AMT - PBNB.LEND_VAT_AMT + PBNB.STRI_VAT_AMT - PBNB.STRO_VAT_AMT AS VAT_AMT /* 확정VAT금액 */ , PBNB.BUY_COST_AMT - PBNB.RFD_COST_AMT - PBNB.LEND_COST_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_COST_AMT + PBNB.STRI_COST_AMT - PBNB.STRO_COST_AMT + PBNB.BUY_VAT_AMT - PBNB.RFD_VAT_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_VAT_AMT - PBNB.LEND_VAT_AMT + PBNB.STRI_VAT_AMT - PBNB.STRO_VAT_AMT AS TOT_AMT /* 확정합계금액 */ , PBNB.BUY_SALE_AMT - PBNB.RFD_SALE_AMT - PBNB.LEND_SALE_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_SALE_AMT + PBNB.STRI_SALE_AMT - PBNB.STRO_SALE_AMT + PBNB.SALE_PRC_DOWN_AF_AMT - PBNB.SALE_PRC_UP_BF_AMT AS CHK_SALE_TAMT /* 확정매가금액 */ FROM ( SELECT PBNB.STR_CD , PBNB.PUMBUN_CD , PBNB.VEN_CD , PBNB.EVENT_FLAG || PBNB.EVENT_RATE AS EVENT_CD , MAX((SELECT MAX(MG_RATE) FROM DPS.PO_SLPDTL WHERE STR_CD = PBNB.STR_CD AND SLIP_NO = PBNB.SLIP_NO)) AS MG_RATE , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'A' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'A' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_TOT_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BUY_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'B' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'B' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_TOT_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS RFD_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'D' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'D' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_TOT_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS LEND_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'C' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'C' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_TOT_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BORROW_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'F' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'F' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_TOT_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRI_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'E' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'E' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_TOT_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRO_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'A' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'A' THEN NVL(PBNB.NEW_COST_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BUY_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'B' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'B' THEN NVL(PBNB.NEW_COST_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS RFD_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'D' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'D' THEN NVL(PBNB.NEW_COST_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS LEND_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'C' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'C' THEN NVL(PBNB.NEW_COST_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BORROW_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'F' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'F' THEN NVL(PBNB.NEW_COST_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRI_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'E' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'E' THEN NVL(PBNB.NEW_COST_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRO_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'A' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'A' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_SALE_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BUY_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'B' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'B' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_SALE_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS RFD_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'D' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'D' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_SALE_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS LEND_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'C' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'C' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_SALE_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BORROW_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'F' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'F' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_SALE_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRI_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'E' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'E' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_SALE_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRO_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'A' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'A' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_VAT_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BUY_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'B' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'B' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_VAT_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS RFD_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'D' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'D' AND PBNB.TAX_FLAG = '1' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_VAT_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BORROW_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'C' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'C' AND PBNB.TAX_FLAG = '1' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_VAT_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS LEND_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'F' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'F' AND PBNB.TAX_FLAG = '1' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_VAT_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRI_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'E' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'E' AND PBNB.TAX_FLAG = '1' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_VAT_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRO_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'G' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'G' AND PBNB.INC_FLAG = '2' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_OLD_SALE_TAMT,0) - NVL(PBNB.CHK_SALE_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE_PRC_UP_BF_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'G' AND PBNB.SLIP_FLAG = 'G' AND PBNB.INC_FLAG = '1' THEN NVL(PBNB.CHK_SALE_TAMT,0) - NVL(PBNB.CHK_OLD_SALE_TAMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE_PRC_DOWN_AF_AMT FROM DPS.PO_SLPMST PBNB WHERE PBNB.STR_CD = ? AND PBNB.CHK_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PBNB.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND PBNB.SLIP_PROC_STAT = '09' GROUP BY PBNB.STR_CD , PBNB.PUMBUN_CD , PBNB.VEN_CD , PBNB.EVENT_FLAG || PBNB.EVENT_RATE ) PBNB , DPS.PC_STRPBN SPBN WHERE SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD LIKE ? || ? || ? || ? ||'%' AND SPBN.BIZ_TYPE IN (?, ?) AND PBNB.STR_CD = SPBN.STR_CD AND PBNB.PUMBUN_CD = SPBN.PUMBUN_CD AND PBNB.PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND (PBNB.BUY_COST_AMT - PBNB.RFD_COST_AMT - PBNB.LEND_COST_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_COST_AMT + PBNB.STRI_COST_AMT - PBNB.STRO_COST_AMT <> 0 OR PBNB.BUY_SALE_AMT - PBNB.RFD_SALE_AMT - PBNB.LEND_SALE_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_SALE_AMT + PBNB.STRI_SALE_AMT - PBNB.STRO_SALE_AMT + PBNB.SALE_PRC_DOWN_AF_AMT - PBNB.SALE_PRC_UP_BF_AMT <> 0 ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = SPBN.STR_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = SPBN.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? AND ROWNUM = 1 AND MYORG.ORG_FLAG = ? ) ORDER BY PBNB.VEN_CD, SPBN.SALE_ORG_CD, SALE_ORG_PC, SALE_ORG_TEAM, SALE_ORG_BM, PUMBUN_CD

SELECT PBNB.STR_CD /* 점코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_STORE_NAME(PBNB.STR_CD) AS STR_NM /* 점명 */ , SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,1,4) AS SALE_ORG_BM /* 부문 조직코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME( SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,1,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,3,2), '00', '00', '00' ) AS SALE_ORG_BM_NM /* 부문 조직명 */ , SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,1,6) AS SALE_ORG_TEAM /* 팀 조직코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME( SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,1,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,3,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,5,2), '00', '00' ) AS SALE_ORG_TEAM_NM /* 팀 조직명 */ , SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,1,8) AS SALE_ORG_PC /* PC 조직코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME( SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,1,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,3,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,5,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,7,2), '00' ) AS SALE_ORG_PC_NM /* PC 조직명 */ , SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD /* 조직코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME( SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,1,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,3,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,5,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,7,2), SUBSTR(SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD,9,2) ) AS SALE_ORG_NM /* 조직명 */ , PBNB.PUMBUN_CD /* 품번코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_PUMBUN_NAME(PBNB.PUMBUN_CD) AS PUMBUN_NM /* 품번명 */ , PBNB.EVENT_CD /* 행사코드 */ , PBNB.MG_RATE AS MG_RATE /* 마진율 */ , PBNB.VEN_CD /* 협력사코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_VENDOR_NAME(PBNB.VEN_CD) AS VEN_NM /* 협력사명 */ , PBNB.BUY_QTY - PBNB.RFD_QTY - PBNB.LEND_QTY + PBNB.BORROW_QTY + PBNB.STRI_QTY - PBNB.STRO_QTY AS CHK_QTY /* 확정수량 */ , PBNB.BUY_COST_AMT - PBNB.RFD_COST_AMT - PBNB.LEND_COST_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_COST_AMT + PBNB.STRI_COST_AMT - PBNB.STRO_COST_AMT AS CHK_COST_TAMT /* 확정원가금액 */ , PBNB.BUY_VAT_AMT - PBNB.RFD_VAT_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_VAT_AMT - PBNB.LEND_VAT_AMT + PBNB.STRI_VAT_AMT - PBNB.STRO_VAT_AMT AS VAT_AMT /* 확정VAT금액 */ , PBNB.BUY_COST_AMT - PBNB.RFD_COST_AMT - PBNB.LEND_COST_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_COST_AMT + PBNB.STRI_COST_AMT - PBNB.STRO_COST_AMT + PBNB.BUY_VAT_AMT - PBNB.RFD_VAT_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_VAT_AMT - PBNB.LEND_VAT_AMT + PBNB.STRI_VAT_AMT - PBNB.STRO_VAT_AMT AS TOT_AMT /* 확정합계금액 */ , PBNB.BUY_SALE_AMT - PBNB.RFD_SALE_AMT - PBNB.LEND_SALE_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_SALE_AMT + PBNB.STRI_SALE_AMT - PBNB.STRO_SALE_AMT + PBNB.SALE_PRC_DOWN_AF_AMT - PBNB.SALE_PRC_UP_BF_AMT AS CHK_SALE_TAMT /* 확정매가금액 */ FROM ( SELECT PBNB.STR_CD , PBNB.PUMBUN_CD , PBNB.VEN_CD , PBNB.EVENT_FLAG || PBNB.EVENT_RATE AS EVENT_CD , NVL(PBNB.MG_RATE,0) AS MG_RATE , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'A' THEN NVL(PBNB.BUY_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BUY_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'B' THEN NVL(PBNB.RFD_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS RFD_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'D' THEN NVL(PBNB.LEND_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS LEND_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'C' THEN NVL(PBNB.BORROW_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BORROW_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'F' THEN NVL(PBNB.STRI_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRI_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'E' THEN NVL(PBNB.STRO_QTY,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRO_QTY , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'A' THEN NVL(PBNB.BUY_COST_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BUY_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'B' THEN NVL(PBNB.RFD_COST_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS RFD_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'D' THEN NVL(PBNB.LEND_COST_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS LEND_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'C' THEN NVL(PBNB.BORROW_COST_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BORROW_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'F' THEN NVL(PBNB.STRI_COST_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRI_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'E' THEN NVL(PBNB.STRO_COST_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRO_COST_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'A' THEN NVL(PBNB.BUY_SALE_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BUY_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'B' THEN NVL(PBNB.RFD_SALE_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS RFD_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'D' THEN NVL(PBNB.LEND_SALE_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS LEND_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'C' THEN NVL(PBNB.BORROW_SALE_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BORROW_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'F' THEN NVL(PBNB.STRI_SALE_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRI_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'E' THEN NVL(PBNB.STRO_SALE_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRO_SALE_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'A' THEN NVL(PBNB.BUY_VAT_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BUY_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'B' THEN NVL(PBNB.RFD_VAT_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS RFD_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'D' THEN NVL(PBNB.BORROW_VAT_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS BORROW_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'C' THEN NVL(PBNB.LEND_VAT_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS LEND_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'F' THEN NVL(PBNB.STRI_VAT_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRI_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'E' THEN NVL(PBNB.STRO_VAT_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS STRO_VAT_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'G' THEN NVL(PBNB.SALE_PRC_UP_BF_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE_PRC_UP_BF_AMT , SUM( CASE WHEN ? = 'G' THEN NVL(PBNB.SALE_PRC_DOWN_AF_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE_PRC_DOWN_AF_AMT FROM DPS.PT_PBNBUY PBNB WHERE PBNB.STR_CD = ? AND PBNB.STK_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY PBNB.STR_CD , PBNB.PUMBUN_CD , PBNB.VEN_CD , PBNB.EVENT_FLAG || PBNB.EVENT_RATE , PBNB.MG_RATE ) PBNB , DPS.PC_STRPBN SPBN WHERE SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD LIKE ? || ? || ? || ? ||'%' AND SPBN.BIZ_TYPE IN (?, ?) AND PBNB.STR_CD = SPBN.STR_CD AND PBNB.PUMBUN_CD = SPBN.PUMBUN_CD AND PBNB.PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND (PBNB.BUY_COST_AMT - PBNB.RFD_COST_AMT - PBNB.LEND_COST_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_COST_AMT + PBNB.STRI_COST_AMT - PBNB.STRO_COST_AMT <> 0 OR PBNB.BUY_SALE_AMT - PBNB.RFD_SALE_AMT - PBNB.LEND_SALE_AMT + PBNB.BORROW_SALE_AMT + PBNB.STRI_SALE_AMT - PBNB.STRO_SALE_AMT + PBNB.SALE_PRC_DOWN_AF_AMT - PBNB.SALE_PRC_UP_BF_AMT <> 0 ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = SPBN.STR_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = SPBN.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? AND ROWNUM = 1 AND MYORG.ORG_FLAG = ? ) ORDER BY SPBN.BUY_ORG_CD, SALE_ORG_PC, SALE_ORG_TEAM, SALE_ORG_BM, PUMBUN_CD
